# HKElectrocardiogramQuery.Result.done

**Case**

The query has finished returning voltage measurements.

## Declaration

```swift
case done
```

## Results

- **HKElectrocardiogramQuery.Result.measurement(_:)**: A single voltage measurement.
- **HKElectrocardiogramQuery.Result.error(_:)**: An error occurred while accessing the voltage measurements.

items.description: An error occurred while accessing the voltage measurements.
